CWEs: CWE-74: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection')
description: The function is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution. The function does not validate the input parameters which can be manipulated to modify a JavaScript object prototype. When that happens, properties that are meant to be present only in certain objects can suddenly appear in other unrelated objects, leading to various application-level bugs and even security vulnerabilities.
